article: russian foreign minister sergei lavrov on thursday slammed washington for acting `` unilaterally '' in the crisis over iran 's nuclear program and urged the world powers to continue diplomatic efforts to resolve the standoff with tehran .
abstract: russia slams us unilateral move on iran
